attributes.title: Caused my phone to be possessed
attributes.review: Immediately after downloading I realized that my phone had become possessed by an orange demon that was sending me creepy messages?? I was really scared so I called up my local magic guy to help me with ex-demoning ritual (I forgot what it’s called 😭) but it was TOO LATE. I’m possessed forever I really hope y’all are okay 🙅‍♀️

attributes.title: DO NOT DOWNLOAD!
attributes.review: this app is CURSED. a bunch of weird stuff started happening after i got this app. first of all my dog got rabies then i suddenly had chlamydia and then i started hearing weird sounds around my house. this app is completely inappropriate for people of all ages! do not download this app unless you want to summon cheeto demons, thanks for reading 💕

attributes.title: ‼️‼️I AM VERY DISAPPOINTED‼️‼️
attributes.review: I am absolutely disgusting by this HORRIBLE app! I was taken aback when i asked for MY PERSONAL INFORMATION! I should not have to give my email or PHONE number to an app! My 20 year old daughter was using this app and it told her that her phone would SELF DESTRUCTION in 5 SECONDS! I wish i could give this no stars, I need to speak with your manager!!!

attributes.title: Awful app! 🧚🏼✨🧚🏼✨
attributes.review: ✨🧚🏼 Got automated messages every two minutes!! drained my phone battery! 🧚🏼✨and accidentally deported my entire family while just downloading the app! As soon as i opened the app i was immediately greeted with an explosion ✨ of cheeto dust all over me!! Now how am i supposed to get the crumbs out my bed?!?! 🦋🧚🏼✨

attributes.title: RUINED MY LIFE! Do not download!
attributes.review: I immediately regretted downloading this app, a spider saw me using the application and seemed upset at me for that choice. So the spider proceeded to crawl towards me aggressively and ended Down my throat I had to go to the hospital for 46 days. Horrible experience. My throat is broken and I cannot speak. My throat look like Donald's neck, truly terrifying folks.

attributes.title: Good App. Surprisingly interesting content.
attributes.review: President Trump has a genius campaign team. I hope we get another 4 years of the Golden Don!!! Trump 2020!!!!

attributes.title: Not news but propaganda
attributes.review: Apple needs to recategorize this app because it is not news. Also think it’s weird that apple is allowing a platform for white supremacy and pedos to run rampant. This app asks for you’re phone number right off the bat. Do not trust them with your private info they will sell it to China!

attributes.title: Quality App
attributes.review: As everything that Trump does, this app is the best quality app I’ve seen produced by a political campaign.

attributes.title: what is dis hunny 🌈🧚🏽💕🤚🏽😋
attributes.review: nobody wants this app, I was going for a walk and then my phone just SHABLAM band opened this app and I Threw up viciously while sitting on the floor laying down, and right I was taking a shower and brushing my teeth while Washing my face while laying in bed and I heard my neighbor doing the dishes downstairs and overall nobody wants this disgusting piece of Cheeto in their iCloud storage, I DONT RECOMEND😋🌈🧚🏽

attributes.title: Sooo bad 🤮🤢
attributes.review:
So I downloaded this app, because why not, but the excessiveness of orangeness left me permanently blinded, and I’m writing this review with the help of a friend. I would like to say that this app stinks, literally! I’ve been smelling a bad stench and it’s kinda like rotten cheese and cheetos..do what you will with this review.

 I usually TPWK, but this time, I’ll did it the Tommo way
